root.name: Club Penguin
root.description: OverviewClub Penguin is a simple MMO aimed at about 6-14 year old, it is a MMO for children that are not quite old enough to play MMO's like World of Warcraft or Runescape yet. Players choose a Penguin to start with and then are left to there own devices on Club Penguin Island, where players can interact with other players, play mini games and buy clothes/items for your penguin.
